Other parsing functions

Source: R/parse-other.R
parse-other.Rd

Other parsing functions

Usage

gi2cm(gi, use.scores = "score")

cm2matrix(cm, replace_NA = NA)

Arguments

gi

GInteractions

use.scores

Which scores to use to inflate GInteractions

cm

A ContactMatrix object

replace_NA

Replace NA values

Value

a dense matrix

Examples

mcool_path <- HiContactsData::HiContactsData('yeast_wt', 'mcool')
#> snapshotDate(): 2022-12-16
#> see ?HiContactsData and browseVignettes('HiContactsData') for documentation
#> loading from cache
contacts <- import(mcool_path, focus = 'XVI', resolution = 16000, format = 'cool')
gis <- interactions(contacts)
cm <- gi2cm(gis, 'balanced')
cm
#> class: ContactMatrix 
#> dim: 60 60 
#> type: dgCMatrix 
#> rownames: NULL
#> colnames: NULL
#> metadata(0):
#> regions: 60
cm2matrix(cm)[1:10, 1:10]
